detailed_results.story:
Maya had always dreamed of becoming a scientist. Despite facing many obstacles,
                including financial difficulties and discouragement from others, she persevered.
                Through years of hard work and determination, she eventually discovered a new
                treatment for a rare disease. Her discovery not only fulfilled her childhood dream
                but also brought hope to thousands of patients worldwide.

detailed_results.story:
Two friends, Alex and Jordan, had very different approaches to solving problems.
                Alex preferred to think carefully before acting, while Jordan liked to jump in
                and learn by doing. When they worked together on a challenging project, they
                initially clashed over their different styles. However, they eventually realized
                that combining their approaches created better solutions than either could achieve alone.
